Hindi Lyrics > Befikra > Befikra Following is the lyrics of 'Befikra' song from hindi movie 'Befikra'. Song: Befikra Movie: Befikra Singer(s): Meet Bros, Aditi Singh Sharma Music By: Meet Bros Lyricist(s): Kumaar Befikra Lyrics from Befikra
Hello hello hello Hello hello hello Ill give the world around me Everything go Hello hello hello Ill view thw world around Hello hello hello Kafirana dil iss duniya Ka kya hai pata Raafon ki raahon main Khuda bhi bhi mil jaye..toh kya..2 Thodi manmaniya ho Thodi nadaniya ho Ho shararatein bhi thodi zara Thodi beimaniyaan ho Dur pareshaniyaan ho Jake duniya se keh do zara Befikra bhi hona zaroori hai Befikari main khona zaroori hai Thodi beimaniyaan ho Dur pareshaniyaan ho Jake duniya se keh do zara....2 Udne laga dil Teri wafa main Jine laga hai Teri aada main Ohhooo Thodi cheddkhaniya ho Dil ki meherbaniya ho Karte jaye hum manmarziya Thodi beimaniya ho Thodi pareshaniya ho Jake duniya se keh do zara Befikra bhi hona zaroori hai Befikari main khona zaroori hai Thodi beimaniyaan ho Dur pareshaniyaan ho Jake duniya se keh do zara. I think im going in sea I think m loosing my mind I need a vilan to blame I need hero to find Zara zara kareeb se Aaja tuzhe main jiu Khuli khuli hai dhadkane Dil se tere baandh loon Tuzhse kahaniyaan ho Tuzhse jawaniya ho Kuch bhi na ho tere bina Thodi manmaniyaan ho Dur pareshaniyaan ho Jake duniya se keh do zara.
